channel.title: error tor bootstrap result: whonixcheck gave up waiting
channel.description:
hello,
recently i imported the new vm of whonix gateway ( because the other vm gave me problems)
so i decided to configured it like internal networking
nevertheless..
it gave me this error when i restarted tor and whonixcheck was running
http://imgur.com/iejc4RL
what's going on?
thanks

item.title: error tor bootstrap result: whonixcheck gave up waiting
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Your change didn’t make sense and broke connectivity. If you want to use Debian, see:

Whonix

Other Operating Systems

Anonymize any Operating System! Your operating system tunneled through the Tor Anonymity Network! Create your Custom-Whonix-Workstation!

Read full topic
item.source: error tor bootstrap result: whonixcheck gave up waiting

item.title: error tor bootstrap result: whonixcheck gave up waiting
item.dc:creator: Maese_Noa
item.description:
Hi

Thanks for your reply

Well… i use virtualbox

And i want to use the vm of whonix gateway like a internal networking i enable it in virtualbox settings network -> adapter

(I will use it because this mode allows to route all my traffic by tor to my another vm that has debian in this case)

Read full topic
item.source: error tor bootstrap result: whonixcheck gave up waiting

item.title: error tor bootstrap result: whonixcheck gave up waiting
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

What hypervisor do you use? What do you mean by:

Maese_Noa:

so i decided to configured it like internal networking

Have a nice day,

Ego
